Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class TechniciansController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.TechniciansController
@Controller public class TechniciansController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with technicians.
Since:
2/8/2022
Author:
Ian Black imb1007@sru.edu

    • showTechList

      @RequestMapping("/technicians") public String showTechList(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the technicians page
      Parameters:
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /technicians

    • showContactList

      @GetMapping("/add-technician") public String showContactList(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Technicians technician, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the add-technician page
      Parameters:
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      technician - Information on the technician being added
      result - Ensures the information entered by the user is valid
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /add/add-technician

    • addtechnician

      @RequestMapping("/addtechnician") public String addtechnician(@Validated Technicians technician, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds a technician to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form. If there are no errors, the technician is saved in the techniciansRepository If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-technician page.
      Parameters:
      technician - Information on the technician being added
      result - Ensures information entered by the user is valid
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /technicians or /add/add-technician

    • showAddTechniciansExcel

      @RequestMapping("/uploadtechnicians") public String showAddTechniciansExcel(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the /uploadtechnicians page when clicking "Upload an excel file" button in the technicians section of Carrier login
      Parameters:
      model - used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/uploadtechnicians"

    • deletetechnician

      @GetMapping("/deletetechnician/{id}") public String deletetechnician(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a technician using the id parameter and if found, redirects to confirmation page If there are dependency issues, the technician is not deleted and an error is displayed to the user.
      Parameters:
      id - of the technician being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /technicians

    • deleteTechnicianConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletetechnicianconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteTechnicianConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a technician using the id parameter and if found, deletes the technician and redirects to technicians page
      Parameters:
      id - of the technician being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      redirects to /technicians

    • viewTechnician

      @GetMapping("/viewtechnician/{id}") public String viewTechnician(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a technician using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that technician to the technicians page
      Parameters:
      id - of the technician being viewed
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /technicians

    • viewMaintenanceOrders

      @GetMapping("/viewmaintenanceorders/{id}") public String viewMaintenanceOrders(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Gets all of the maintenance orders associated with the technician and adds those to the maintenance order page
      Parameters:
      id - of the technician used to get the maintenance orders
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /maintenanceorders

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/edittechnician/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the edit technicians page
      Parameters:
      id - of the technician being edited
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /edit/edit-technicians

    • updateTechnician

      @PostMapping("/edittechnicians/{id}") public String updateTechnician(@PathVariable("id") long id, Technicians technician, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives the new technician object and validates it Once valid the object is saved to the technicians repository
      Parameters:
      id - of the technician being edited
      technician - holds the new technician object submitted by the user
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /technicians or /edit/edit-technicians
